verses.text: \w A|strong="H0430"\w* canticle \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0430"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*.

\w O|strong="H4970"\w* God, \w who|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* thee? hold not thy peace, neither \w be|strong="H7563"\w* thou \w still|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H4970"\w* God.

\w For|strong="H8199"\w* lo, thy enemies have \w made|strong="H6663"\w* \w a|strong="H7326"\w* noise: \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w they|strong="H6041"\w* that hate thee have lifted up \w the|strong="H8199"\w* head.

\w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w taken|strong="H5337"\w* \w a|strong="H3027"\w* malicious counsel \w against|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w people|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* consulted \w against|strong="H3027"\w* thy saints.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* said: \w Come|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H3045"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* nation: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Israel \w be|strong="H3808"\w* remembered \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* contrived \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* consent: \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3605"\w* covenant together \w against|strong="H3605"\w* thee,

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* tabernacles \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* Edomites, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* Ismahelites: Moab, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* Agarens,

Gebal, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Ammon \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Amalec: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Philistines, \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Tyre.
Yea, and the Assyrian also is joined with them: they are come to the aid of the sons of Lot.
Do to them as thou didst to Madian and to Sisara: as to Jabin at the brook of Cisson.
Who perished at Endor: and became as dung for the earth.
Make their princes like Oreb, and Zeb, and Zebee, and Salmana. All their princes,
Who have said: Let us possess the sanctuary of God for an inheritance.
O my God, make them like a wheel; and as stubble before the wind.
As fire which burneth the wood: and as a flame burning mountains:
So shalt thou pursue them with thy tempest: and shalt trouble them in thy wrath.
Fill their faces with shame; and they shall seek thy name, O Lord.
Let them be ashamed and troubled for ever and ever: and let them be confounded and perish.
And let them know that the Lord is thy name: thou alone art the most High over all the earth.
